alert.note: Alert for Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:54PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Oglala Lakota County through 545 PM MDT... At 454 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 5 miles north of Number 4, or 12 miles north of Pine Ridge, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Calico around 500 PM MDT. Pine Ridge and Wounded Knee around 510 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Wolf Creek Housing and Wakpamni. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
